Celebrating #Apollo11at50 is a good reminder of Americans’ desire to explore the universe and our passion for innovation. That’s why I’m glad to see NASA focus on a human mission to the Moon by 2024 and commit to sending astronauts to Mars soon after – ideally in 2033! #Mars2033

I was 16 years old when Americans set foot on the Moon. My family lived in Wheat Ridge at the time and I remember watching it in our living room, lime green shag carpet and all. It was a family event – we were glued to the TV as we watched with pride & amazement. #Apollo50th

The twelve lives lost, their friends and families, and the Aurora community have remained in our hearts since that fateful day seven years ago. 

We will never forget and will continue to work to honor them every day. #HonorWithAction http://bit.ly/2Y4xrn1
